title: Restrap Bicycle Protection Kit contoured decals prevent bikepacking frame scratches
content:
There are plenty of stick-on vinyl options to safeguard your paint job, but Restrap’s new Bicycle Protection Kit adds a simple bikepacking-specific touch with topographic inspiration. Developed to prevent damage to your bike’s finish from the constant rubbing of dirty pack straps, the low-cost clear protection sticker set will also protect against normal cable rub […]

The post Restrap Bicycle Protection Kit contoured decals prevent bikepacking frame scratches appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
